00205 if ($_POST) {
00206     if ($_POST['>>']) {
00207         foreach ($_POST['Items'] as $Ext) {
00208             $View->Controller($Output, 'DisableExtMime', $_SESSION[$View->Model]['Group'], $Submenu, $_POST['ListType'], $Ext);
00209         }
00210     }
00211     else if ($_POST['<<']) {
00212         foreach ($_POST['Items'] as $Ext) {
00213             $View->Controller($Output, 'EnableExtMime', $_SESSION[$View->Model]['Group'], $Submenu, $_POST['ListType'], $Ext);
00214         }
00215     }
00216     else if ($_POST['Delete']) {
00217         foreach ($_POST['Items'] as $Ext) {
00218             $View->Controller($Output, 'DelExtMime', $_SESSION[$View->Model]['Group'], $Submenu, $_POST['ListType'], $Ext);
00219         }
00220     }
00221     else if ($_POST['Add'] && $_POST['ItemToAdd']) {
00222         $View->Controller($Output, 'AddExtMime', $_SESSION[$View->Model]['Group'], $Submenu, $_POST['ListType'], $_POST['ItemToAdd'], $_POST['CommentToAdd']);
00223     }
00224 }
00225 
00226 $View->SetSessionFilterGroup();
00227 
00228 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');
00229 
00230 if ($PrintGroupForm) {
00231     $View->PrintFilterGroupForm();
00232 }
00233 PrintFilterExtMimeForm($Submenu);
00234 PrintHelpWindow($View->ConfHelpMsg."\n\n".$ListHelpMsg);

00236 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'footer.php');
